item.title: Slides: Fullscreen
item.description: File Permissions Linux File Permissions All files have permissions for different types of classifications The classifications are Owners, Groups, and Others Available Permissions Read, Write, Execute, None Read: User, Group, and Other can Read the file Write: User, Group, and Other can Write to the file Execute: User, Group, and Other can execute the file None: None of the above permissions Possible Permission Combinations Read only Write Only Execute only Read and Write Read and Execute Write and Execute Read, Write, and Execute None
